Add GitHub workflow for Cloudflare deployment on merge to main
description:
## Overview

Create a GitHub Actions workflow that deploys both the API worker and client app to Cloudflare Workers when code is merged to main.

## File to Create

- `.github/workflows/deploy.yml`

## Workflow Steps

1. Checkout code
2. Setup pnpm + Node 20
3. Install dependencies (frozen lockfile)
4. Build shared package first (apps depend on it)
5. Type check all packages
6. Build client app (Vite â†’ dist/)
7. Deploy API worker (--env production)
8. Deploy client worker

## Required GitHub Secrets

| Secret | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN | API token with Workers edit permissions |
| CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID | Your Cloudflare account ID |

## Pre-Deployment Setup (One-Time)

### 1. Create Cloudflare API Token
1. Go to https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens
2. Click "Create Token"
3. Use "Edit Cloudflare Workers" template
4. Scope to your account and zone
5. Copy the token

### 2. Get Account ID
1. Go to https://dash.cloudflare.com
2. Copy Account ID from right sidebar

### 3. Add GitHub Secrets
1. Repo Settings > Secrets and variables > Actions
2. Add CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN
3. Add CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID

### 4. Set ANTHROPIC_API_KEY in Cloudflare
\`\`\`bash
cd apps/api
pnpm wrangler secret put ANTHROPIC_API_KEY --env production
\`\`\`

## Workflow File Content

\`\`\`yaml
name: Deploy to Cloudflare

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup pnpm
        uses: pnpm/action-setup@v4
        with:
          version: 9

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
          cache: 'pnpm'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile

      - name: Build shared package
        run: pnpm --filter @fast/shared build

      - name: Type check
        run: pnpm typecheck

      - name: Build client
        run: pnpm --filter @fast/client build

      - name: Deploy API
        uses: cloudflare/wrangler-action@v3
        with:
          apiToken: \${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN }}
          accountId: \${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID }}
          workingDirectory: apps/api
          command: deploy --env production

      - name: Deploy Client
        uses: cloudflare/wrangler-action@v3
        with:
          apiToken: \${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN }}
          accountId: \${{ secrets.CLOUDFLARE_ACCOUNT_ID }}
          workingDirectory: apps/client
          command: deploy
\`\`\`

## Verification

After implementation, verify:
- Workflow runs on push to main
- API deploys to writing-scorecard-api.<subdomain>.workers.dev
- Client deploys to writing-scorecard.<subdomain>.workers.dev
